questions.question: This field of AI focuses on the interaction between computers and humans through natural language.
This technique is used to convert text into a numerical representation that can be processed by machine learning algorithms.
This model, developed by Google, is widely used for natural language understanding and generation tasks.
questions.answer: What is BERT (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers)?

questions.question: This term refers to the process of identifying and extracting meaningful entities from text, such as names, dates, and locations.
This technique involves predicting the next word in a sequence based on the previous words.
